pages.text: $(bgreen)Puff Shroom$() only recently became aware of the existence of zombies. This whole experience has been a huge eye-opener for it.$(br)$(byellow)Sun Cost$() : $(l)0$()$(br)$(bblue)Recharge$() : $(l)Very Fast$()$(br)$(l)Features$() : It is a $(l)medium range attack$() plant that shoots $(bred)one spore$() every 1.5 seconds to attack enemy.$(bred)It will sleep at daytime$().
$(bgreen)Plant Food :$() It will shoot $(l)a spore each tick$() which last 1 seconds.$(bred)It will activate other nearby Puff Shrooms to be in super mode$().
